Instrument.name: NEAR INFRARED SPECTROMETER
Instrument.description: The near-infrared spectrometer (NIS) is a grating infrared spectrometer with a 32-element Ge array covering the spectral range 1348-2732 nm. The NIS stopped collecting data on 13 May 2000 for unknown reasons after taking more than 50,000 spectra covering 60% of the surface.
